metadata.Title: CVE-2022-42896 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - high
metadata.Description:
There are use-after-free vulnerabilities in the Linux kernel'snet/bluetooth/l2cap_core.c's l2cap_connect and l2cap_le_connect_reqfunctions which may allow code execution and leaking kernel memory(respectively) remotely via Bluetooth. A remote attacker could execute codeleaking kernel memory via Bluetooth if within proximity of the victim. Werecommend upgrading past commit https://www.google.com/urlhttps://github.com/torvalds/linux/commit/711f8c3fb3db61897080468586b970c87c61d9e4https://www.google.com/url

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-42896` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.1.0-16-generic - 6.1.0-16.16
linux-image-6.1.0-16-generic-lpae - 6.1.0-16.16
linux-image-unsigned-6.1.0-16-generic - 6.1.0-16.16
linux-image-unsigned-6.1.0-16-generic-64k - 6.1.0-16.16
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.1.0-16.16').
linux-kvm package in lunar is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication.
linux-aws package in lunar is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication.
linux-azure package in lunar is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication.
linux-gcp package in lunar is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication.
linux-ibm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of kernel support, was pending').
linux-lowlatency package in lunar is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication.
linux-oracle package in lunar is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication.
linux-raspi package in lunar is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication.
